column2: #- some of this code (only the aesthetic stuff was taken from chatgpt and modified to fit my own code - I just did this to make the graph look pretty/for personal satisfaction as I just wanted to take my visual to the next level so to speak)
geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = "lm", col = "red") + labs(title = "Age vs Crown Diameter", x = "Average Age (Years)", y = "Average Crown Diameter (m)") +
